Subject: Need assistance with report
Description: Tay assisted us with creating a report that shows folder permission changes, We need assistance with expanding that report to include all shares as it appears to only be pulling in user directories. See attached spreadsheet.
What_We_Know__c: Customer is looking for a report that will show permission changes on the top 2 levels of shares.
Next_Steps__c: A report was provided, but it looks to only show local folders and not shares/unc. Investigating if this is an easy adjustment or if ProServ will need to get involved.
Solution_Comment__c: Helped create a report for showing permission changes on shares for the last week
